hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) used to pray (optional, non-obligatory prayer) while riding on his mount (Rahila) wherever it turned, and whenever he wanted to pray the compulsory prayer he dismounted and prayed facing the Qibla

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّوَجُّهِ نَحْوَ الْقِبْلَةِ حَيْثُ كَانَ
chapter.eng-name: [During the obligatory Salat (prayers)] one should face the Qiblah (Kabah at Makkah) wherever one may be
